keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue to grow our economy and invest in people's priorities.
Restore Scotland as the best place to grow up and get on in life.
Back our healthcare services and ensure they are there for you and your family when you need them.
Invest in the services that matter most to the people of Scotland.
United ambitions to end our contribution to climate change by 2045 and protect our environment.
Deliver the reforms that are so desperately needed to fix the problems facing Scotland.

issues.economy: Continue to grow our economy and invest in people's priorities.
issues.education: Restore Scotland as the best place to grow up and get on in life.
issues.environment: United ambitions to end our contribution to climate change by 2045 and protect our environment.
issues.governance: Deliver the reforms that are so desperately needed to fix the problems facing Scotland.
issues.health: Back our healthcare services and ensure they are there for you and your family when you need them.

quotes.text: Your vote will decide between them.

images.caption: TWO FUTURES - 5 years of stability with the Conservatives or 5 years of Chaos with Labour and the SNP
